Opening a Crypto Wallet

Download App
Get the official Trust Wallet app on your device.
Create Wallet
Open the app and press 'Create a new wallet'.
Back Up
Secure your secret phrase carefully offline.
Verify
Enter the security phrase to confirm backup.
Confirm
Arrange words in correct order to finish setup.
Complete
Your secure crypto wallet is now ready!

Buy Cryptocurrency

Select Crypto
Choose the cryptocurrency you want to buy.
Amount
Enter the amount you want to purchase.
Providers
Select from the best rates available.
Select
Choose your preferred provider.
Finalize
Follow the instructions to complete purchase.
Done
Your crypto will arrive shortly.
